鵶字的基本解释

鵶
yā
同“鸦”。

鵶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yā］
［《廣韻》於加切，平麻，影。］
“鸦1”的繁体字。亦作“鵶1”。
(1)鸟类的一属。体型较大。羽色灰黑，喙及足皆强壮，多巢于高树，杂食谷类、果实、昆虫、鸟卵与雏以及腐败的动物尸体。广布于全球。分布于我国的有大嘴乌鸦、秃鼻乌鸦、寒鸦、渡鸦等。
(2)比喻黑色。多形容妇女鬓发。

鵶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵶； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第21
【廣韻】於加切，音掗。同鴉。又地名。【丹鉛錄註】三鵶在汝州，古繞角城，項城縣爲第一鵶，分領山爲第二鵶，汝州爲第三鵶。【韓翊詩】三鵶水上一歸人。

鵶
Basic explanation of words
鵶
yā
Same as "crow".
鵶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yā］
["Guangyun" Yu Jiaqie, Pingma, Shadow. ]
The traditional characters of "crow1". Also known as "鵶1".
(1) A genus of birds. Larger body. The feathers are gray-black, with strong beaks and feet, nesting in tall trees, omnivorous cereals, fruits, insects, bird eggs and chicks, and decaying animal carcasses. Widely spread all over the world. There are big-mouthed crows, bald-nosed crows, jackdaws, and ravens distributed in our country.
(2) A metaphor for black. More to describe women's sideburns.
鵶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵶; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1492 Page 21
[Guangyun] Yu Jiaqie, Yinyi. Same crow. Also place name. [Notes on Danqian Records] The three scorpions are in Ruzhou, the ancient round corner city, Xiangcheng County is the first scorpion, the subling mountain is the second scorpion, and Ruzhou is the third scorpion. [Han Yi's Poems] Three scorpions return to the water.
